thread.title: 19 Times Alfred Enoch And His Glorious Dimples Were The Gift We Didn't Deserve
thread.title_full: 19 Times Alfred Enoch And His Glorious Dimples Were The Gift We Didn't Deserve

author: Gena-mour Barrett
title: 19 Times Alfred Enoch And His Glorious Dimples Were The Gift We Didn't Deserve
text:
Would happily watch him play charades very badly for hours. ID: 10393596 7. When he invented laughing. View this image ›
Pascal Le Segretain / Getty Images Nobody laughs like Alfred Enoch. Nobody.
ID: 10393644 8. And then he went ahead and invented drinking water too, because why not? View this image ›
Vivien Killilea / Getty Images He probably knew how thirsty we’d all be.
ID: 10394331 9. When he was the cutest little button in the Harry Potter franchise. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Pictures ID: 10393992 10. Even when he was throwing shade at Voldemort. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Studios ID: 10394002 11. Or getting a little too into it at a Quidditch match. View this image ›
Warner Bros. Studios ID: 10394195 12. When he wore this excellent dashiki, and somehow managed to look as chuffed as you would if you’d won the lottery. View this image ›
Mark Davis / Getty Images ID: 10394269 13. When his face of concern was handsome as fuck. View this image ›
David Buchan / Getty Images It’s the face he’d give you while listening to your problems after a long, hard day. He just really cares about you.
ID: 10394477 14. When he and co-star, Matt McGorry, couldn’t keep their hands off of each other at the Monte-Carlo TV Festival. View this image ›
Valery Hache / Getty Images Would happily snuggle between these two, tbh.
ID: 10394499 15. When he finished the Nautica Malibu Triathlon and still looked radiant, despite probably having sweated buckets. View this image ›
Noel Vasquez / Getty Images Looking all green and outdoorsy, like a perfect lil’ tree.
ID: 10394520 16. And his adventurousness extended to parasailing in Brazil, where he seemingly had a whale of a time. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @parasailinrio I mean, this could be us, Alfie, but you playing.
ID: 10393213 17. When he had the coolest gang known to man – Matt, Karla, Aja, Jack, and, of course, those two perfect dimples. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @karlasouzaofficial ID: 10394630 18. When he won the crown for Most Adorable Babyface On A Human Being Who Is In Fact Not A Baby. View this image ›
Valery Hache / Getty Images A title I just made up.
ID: 10394505 19. And when the TV show he starred in finally made total sense, because a face like this really could get away with murder. View this image ›
David Buchan / Getty Images God bless you, Alfred Enoch.
ID: 10394475
Gena-mour Barrett is a staff writer for BuzzFeed UK and is based in London.
